snippet.title: Pixel Ripped 1978 - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Travel back in time to the groovy year of 1978 when Atari was creating classic games! From the legendary VR developers, ARVORE, comes a new title in the Pixel Ripped franchise, Pixel Ripped 1978. 

Play as the daring heroine Dot as she ventures through different dimensions to repair classic Atari Games and put an end to Cyblin Lord's diabolically demented plans.

Pixel Ripped: 1978 coming soon to Meta, Steam, and PSVR2.

Join the conversation on Discord to learn more! https://discord.gg/atariclub
